data.description: perl_style to javaStyle conversion of params
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Params::Style changes the keys of hashes of named parameter, so the
    author can easily allow javaStyleNames or perl_style_names.

    It can be extended to other kinds of transformation.

    This is a simple operation, more limited in scope than what
    Params::Check and Params::Validate do. Params::Check offers a way to
    convert all keys to lower case, but no way to go further.
    Params::Validate does not change the hash keys.
